title: Chinese EXIM Bank releases US $ 60Mn as part of loan
body_lines: EXIM Bank of China has released US $ 60 million as part of the loan for the construction of the first stage of the Central Expressway, a diplomatic source said.

“All the investment and construction projects by Chinese companies are undergoing with no interruption, contributing a lot to the employment and development of Sri Lanka,” the source said. (Kelum Bandara)
